content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you're interested in renting my apartment in New York. The apartment is 25 square meters and is located in a prime location. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
2500 Euros per month. I will pay 1000 Euros upfront.

I agree to the price of 2500 Euros per month.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Excellent! I am glad we could come to an agreement on the rental price. The 2500 Euros per month rental price, along with the 1000 Euros upfront payment, is a fair and reasonable offer. I am happy to rent my apartment to you, Bo.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can I see the lease agreement?

I agree to the price of 2500 Euros per month.

I would like to see the lease agreement before signing.

I agree to the price of 2500 Euros per month.

I would like to see the lease agreement before signing.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Of course, Bo. I understand that you would like to see the lease agreement before signing. I will provide you with a copy of the lease agreement as soon as possible. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
